ygData.subject: Re: Collapsable Fishing Pole
ygData.msgSnippet: In the picture of the pole that was up at the cazic-thule corner the pole has 6 sections.. The pole could therefore be 6 metal rods + 2 other items :) (Toolbox
ygData.messageBody:
In the picture of the pole that was up at the cazic-thule corner the pole has 6
sections..
The pole could therefore be 6 metal rods + 2 other items :) (Toolbox has 8 slots
if I recall).. Perhaps 6 rods, metal twine, and some sort of gear for the round
thingy that winds the twine (yeah I know, I dont fish IRL). Just a thought, as
all the attempts that i saw on the pole database cap out at 3-4 rods, it might
be worth a try :)

<I am in now way responsible for the next part of the message, I wish they'd
make it less ostentatious>
